title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Biden and Harris target the 2nd Amendment to distract from the border crisis. Rush explains to liberals why the 2nd Amendment protects them too. Rush on how we support legal immigration, but Democrats do not. The NBA holds talks with ChiCom TV to televise NBA games on communist state TV. Rush on the relationship between the NBA and the ChiComs. David Limbaugh's touching column on Rush: Goodbye to My Brother -- For Now. Missouri caller on David, Rush and the state of the nation. Caller wants to teach a course on Rush at a local college.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Rush on what would've happened during the lockdown if we'd listened to the environmentalist wackos and shut down fossil fuels. Rush asks a question: Leftists stand for statism, total control over your life -- what do we stand for? Rush on Millennials, statists and public transportation. Don't miss the tribute to Rush film at RushLimbaugh.com. Idaho caller on lack of public transportation in the Heartland, less opportunity for leftists to restrict freedom.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Biden on red flag gun laws. Rush exposes what red flag laws really mean. Biden: No constitutional right is absolute. Rush tipped us off to Amazon banning mail-in ballots for its own employees voting on whether to unionize. We hear an excerpt from a rare Rush interview with Sylvester Stallone. Brett reads from David Limbaugh's column on Rush. Yelling "fire" in a crowded theater.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
